lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa shot a seven-under-par 65 to take a one-stroke lead after the first round of the Evian Masters in Evian-les-Bains, France. Ochoa started with a birdie on the first hole and added six more on the back nine in a bogey-free round. Ahn Sun-ju, Candie Kung and Angela Park trailed by one stroke.
